ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: We thank the Potsdam Institute of Climate Impact Research in Potsdam, Germany, for its support, especially Hans-Joachim Schellnhuber and Daniel Klingenfeld for their great flexibility and patience. We thank Anat Feldman and Yuval Itescu for help in getting underlying species richness values for continents. Thanks also to all those authors that readily gave us their data, figures and photographs from their studies.
